```{r, echo =FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

#ANOVA-test:


#ANOVA-test nfl
load(here::here("data/NCS_biomark.rda"))

library(tidyverse)

attach(NCS_biomark)
test.aov.NfL <- aov(NfL ~ DSPN_dia, data = NCS_biomark)
summary(test.aov.NfL)

TukeyHSD(test.aov.NfL)

n_NfL<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$NfL~NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia, FUN=length)
mean_NfL<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$NfL,by=list(NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia),FUN=mean, na.rm=TRUE)
sds_NfL<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$NfL~NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia, FUN=sd)
min_NfL<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$NfL,by=list(NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia),FUN=min, na.rm=TRUE)
max_NfL<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$NfL,by=list(NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia),FUN=max, na.rm=TRUE)
myResults_NfL<-cbind(n_NfL, mean_NfL, min_NfL, max_NfL, sds_NfL)
colnames(myResults_NfL)<-c("diabetes and neuropathy status","n","mean","range","st.dev.")
myResults_NfL

#ANOVA-test MMA

NCS_biomark$MMA <- as.numeric(MMA)

TukeyHSD(test.aov.mma)

sds_mma<-aggregate(NCS_biomark$MMA~NCS_biomark$DSPN_dia, FUN=sd)

colnames(myResults_mma)<-c("diabetes and neuropathy status","n","mean","min", "max","st.dev.")
myResults_mma
```

```{r}

#Median(range) tabel 

load(here::here("data/med_rang.rda"))

library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(flextable)


ft_med_rang <- flextable(med_rang, cwidth=1.5,
  cheight = 0.25) %>% 
    set_caption(caption = "Table 3: Concentration of plasma biomarkers in participants with Type 1 diabetes and neuropathy, with Type 1 diabetes without neuropathy and in control group") %>% 
    theme_vanilla() %>% 
    add_footer_lines("Median(range). *ANOVA-test") %>% 
    color(part = "footer", color = "#666666") %>% 
    bold(i=1, j="p*") %>% 
    bold(i=3, j="p*") %>% 
    autofit() 
    

ft_med_rang
```

```{r, echo =FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}

#Box plot for NfL med logistisk y-akse
load(here::here("data/NCS_biomark.rda"))

library(tidyverse)
require(scales)

NCS_biomark_tidied <- NCS_biomark %>% 
    filter(!is.na(DSPN_dia))

ggplot(NCS_biomark_tidied, aes(x = DSPN_dia, y = NfL, fill = DSPN_dia)) +
    geom_boxplot(na.rm  = TRUE) +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(title = "Box plot", x = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", y = "log plasma NfL-level (ng/l)") + 
    labs(subtitle = "The concentration of plasma NfL in patients with Type 1 diabetes with and without neuropathy and in control participants")+
    stat_boxplot(geom="errorbar", width = 0.2) +
      scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "inferno", alpha = 0.5, name="Groups", labels=c("Controls","T1D w/o DN","T1D with DN"))+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"))+
    scale_y_continuous(trans = log2_trans(),
    breaks = trans_breaks("log2", function(x) 2^x),
    labels = trans_format("log2", math_format(2^.x)))

#Box plot for NfL uden logistisk y-akse
ggplot(NCS_biomark_tidied, aes(x = DSPN_dia, y = NfL, fill = DSPN_dia)) +
    geom_boxplot(na.rm  = TRUE) +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(title = "Box plot", x = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", y = "plasma NfL-level (ng/l)") + 
    labs(subtitle = "The concentration of plasma NfL in patients with Type 1 diabetes with and without neuropathy and in control participants")+
    stat_boxplot(geom="errorbar", width = 0.2) +
      scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "inferno", alpha = 0.5, name="Groups", labels=c("Controls","T1D w/o DN","T1D with DN"))+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"))


#Boxplot for B12 
ggplot(NCS_biomark_tidied, aes(x = DSPN_dia, y = B12, fill = DSPN_dia)) +
    geom_boxplot(na.rm  = TRUE) +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(title = "Box plot", x = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", y = "plasma B12-level (pmol/l)") + 
    labs(subtitle = "The concentration of plasma B12 in patients with Type 1 diabetes with and without neuropathy and in control participants")+
    stat_boxplot(geom="errorbar", width = 0.2) +
      scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "mako", alpha = 0.5, name="Groups", labels=c("Controls","T1D w/o DN","T1D with DN"))+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"))


#Boxplot for MMA

attach((NCS_biomark_tidied))
NCS_biomark_tidied$MMA <- as.numeric(MMA)
ggplot(NCS_biomark_tidied, aes(x = DSPN_dia, y = MMA, fill = DSPN_dia)) +
    geom_boxplot(na.rm  = TRUE) +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(title = "Box plot", x = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", y = "plasma MMA-level (umol/l)") + 
    labs(subtitle = "The concentration of plasma MMA in patients with Type 1 diabetes with and without neuropathy and in control participants")+
    stat_boxplot(geom="errorbar", width = 0.2) +
      scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "rocket", alpha = 0.5, name="Groups", labels=c("Controls","T1D w/o DN","T1D with DN"))+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"))


#Boxplot for holoTC
ggplot(NCS_biomark_tidied, aes(x = DSPN_dia, y = holoTC, fill = DSPN_dia)) +
    geom_boxplot(na.rm  = TRUE) +
    theme_classic() +
    labs(title = "Box plot", x = "Diabetes and neuropathy status", y = "plasma holoTC-level (pmol/l)") + 
    labs(subtitle = "The concentration of plasma holoTC in patients with Type 1 diabetes with and without neuropathy and in control participants")+
    stat_boxplot(geom="errorbar", width = 0.2) +
      scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "turbo", alpha = 0.5, name="Groups", labels=c("Controls","T1D w/o DN","T1D with DN"))+
      theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())+
    theme(legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_text(face = "bold"))
```
